title: Activision Blizzard 's net income/loss from 2005 to 2018
yAxis: Net income in million U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Net income in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Net income in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2011, and finally roughly constant from 2011 to 2015.
The line rapidly increased by 269.91% from Year 2009 to 2010, and lastly, increased by 159.57% from Year 2010 to 2011.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Net income in million U.S. dollars, about 1149.0 was reported at Year 2012
Minimum Net income in million U.S. dollars about 107.0 was reached at Year 2008
